objects.text: • TWIN-TURBO V8 • 0-60 IN 2.8s • CARBON FIBER CHASSIS

product_details.name: McLaren 720S - Ultimate Supercar Excellence in Papaya Orange
product_details.description:
• ✨ Twin-turbocharged 4.0L V8 engine delivering 710 horsepower
• 🚀 0-60 mph in just 2.8 seconds with a top speed of 212 mph
• 🛠️ Carbon fiber MonoCage II chassis for exceptional strength and lightness
• 🎨 Striking Papaya Orange exterior with aerodynamic body styling
• 🔧 7-speed dual-clutch transmission for lightning-fast gear changes
• 💺 Premium leather interior with advanced driver-focused cockpit
• 🌟 Innovative active suspension system for superior handling
• 🛡️ Advanced ProActive Chassis Control II for optimal performance
• 🔥 Distinctive dihedral doors for dramatic entrance and exit
• 🎯 Advanced aerodynamic features including active rear spoiler

banner_details:
This banner features a high-performance sports car showcased at the center, encircled by dual orange outline rings to enhance visual impact. The background uses a radial gradient from deep charcoal gray to black with dotted highlights and angular accents for dynamic energy. The title text layer, "heading", is in bold uppercase orange, exuding power and excitement. Directly below, the "subheading" text is in sleek white modern typography, emphasizing a premium, futuristic driving theme. A bright circular tag highlights the “price” text in bold white. Technical car specs are represented with the "description" text line. A contrasting horizontal orange button at the bottom contains the "cta" text for immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black (#121212)
- Charcoal Gray (#2D2D2D)
- Bright Orange (#FF6600)
- Light Orange Gradient (#FF7800 to #FF5500)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: This product image showcases a high-performance sports car with a striking and vibrant color palette. The dominant color is a saturated metallic orange (#FF6F00), which creates a bold and energetic impression. Black accents (#1A1A1A) are strategically used in the headlights, wheels, and air vents to provide contrast and depth. Highlights and reflections in gloss white (#F5F5F5) and subtle grey tones (#A9A9A9) add dimension and realism. The fusion of these colors enhances the car's sleek curves and aerodynamic body, perfectly balancing attention-grabbing vibrancy with luxury and sophistication—making it ideal for dynamic, premium automotive advertisement banners.
